official-title.#text:
To revise the boundaries of John H. Chafee Coastal
		  Barrier Resources System Sachuest Point Unit RI–04P, Easton Beach Unit RI–05P,
		  Almy Pond Unit RI–06, and Hazards Beach Unit RI–07 in Rhode
		  Island.
